titles: Wisdom justified of her children from the ignorance and calumny of H. Hallywell in his book called, An account of familism as it is revived and propagated by the Quakers / by William Penn.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
keywords: Hallywell, Henry, d. 1703? --  An account of familism.
